content: passion-knit socks by natural knits 1 pattern description inspired by my love for knitting socks and how knitting has brought such goodness into my life from chatting with other knitters during test knits to being inspired by others work and smooshing the most delectable colours and textures you could shake a knitting needle at these socks feature dip stitch hearts that are actually simple to do and creates a wonderful texture that shows off solids variegated and any yarn in between i hope these socks bring a smile to your face and warmth to your feet note top down socks will have hearts pointing downwards size small medium large finished measurements foot circumference 7 7 8 8 5 inches/ 17 5 19 21 5 cm foot length adjustable choose a size with approximately 1 inch/ 2 5 cm of negative ease in the foot circumference note the dip stitches in this pattern add width to the sock the stitch counts have been adjusted to fit your size materials yarn lichen and lace 80/20 sock 80% merino wool 20% nylon 365 yards per 100 grams poppy colourway recommend needle size 1 set us #1 / 2 25 mm needles for knitting in the round notions wool needle for grafting stitch markers gauge 32 sts/ 44 row = 4 inches/ 10 cm in stockinette 2 toe up pattern tip stand on a piece of paper mark length toe of foot from tips of toes to end of heel mark 2 1 inches/5 3 cm from end of heel use this to
